description: It had been suggested that recent legislation would see the records sealed for 30 years.
title: Mother and baby homes: Adoptees and survivors can access information
title_page: Mother and baby homes: Adoptees and survivors can access information - BBC News
maintext: Campaigners and some of those seeking more information about their own life story, including their natural mother and their adoption, said sealing the records for 30 years would deny them an opportunity to find out more about themselves and their history.
